location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a communication (not present) received from Stephen Henshaw dated 20 October 1811, and the Resident's reply (see f. 68v). It further conveys a request from William Bruce for clarification on the amount of cash (beyond bills) that he is authorised to advance to the Marine Agent.
